thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: RPT-China QFII quota unchanged at $97.16 bln at end-Jan - FX regulator

title: RPT-China QFII quota unchanged at $97.16 bln at end-Jan - FX regulator
text:
29 AM / Updated 33 minutes ago RPT-China QFII quota unchanged at $97.16 bln at end-Jan - FX regulator Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
(Repeats to attach to alerts. No change to text) 
BEIJING, Jan 31 (Reuters) - The outstanding amount of Chinaâ€™s dollar-denominated Qualified Foreign Institutional Investor (QFII) programme stood at $97.16 billion as of Jan. 30, unchanged from end-December, the foreign exchange regulator said on Wednesday. 
The QFII scheme was created by China to allow foreigners to invest in Chinese capital markets. (Reporting by Beijing Monitoring Desk; Editing by Richard Borsuk)
